integration_option.label: Integration Option
integration_option.comment:
Opportunity (only) - When Magento order is placed, Salesforce will record that transaction as an Opportunity in Salesforce. As Magento order transitions through various states, Opportunity will change Stage Names as well.
Order (only) - Salesforce Order will only be created when an order in Magento is fully paid. After Salesforce order is captured and as Magento order transitions through various states, Salesforce Order Status will change as well.
Opportunity & Order - When Magento order is placed, Salesforce will record that transaction as an Opportunity in Salesforce. As soon as Magento order will be paid in full, Salesforce Order will be created in Salesforce to capture a sales transaction.

create_order.label: Create Order
create_order.comment:
Always - Salesforce Order will be created as soon as Magento Order is placed (regardless of the Order status in Magento).
PAID Order - Salesforce Order will be created as soon as Magento Order is fully PAID.
